A '''powder snow bucket''' is a [[bucket]] filled with [[powder snow]], which is the only way to carry it as an [[item]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Interacting ===
A powder snow bucket can be obtained by {{ctrl|using}} an [[empty bucket]] on a [[powder snow block]] or [[powder snow cauldron]]. 

Obtainable by placing an empty cauldron when it is [[Snowfall|snow]]ing, and when filled can be collected with a bucket.

== Usage ==
Pressing {{control|use}} while holding a powder snow bucket places a [[powder snow]] block. Powder snow may also be placed inside empty [[cauldron]]s, creating powder snow cauldrons.

[[Dispenser]]s can also create and place powder snow buckets. However, they cannot do so with [[cauldron]]s.

Powder snow can be placed while falling to cushion falls, even in [[the Nether]].

If you have two buckets of powder snow you can place one stand on top of it and place the other. Then carefully stand on the edge (don't crouch or you will sink) and pick up the bottom block in your bucket. Repeat this process and you will be able to tower infinitely. Make sure you are wearing [[leather boots]] so you do not sink.
